title: Resilience Through Color
description: This piece represents the beginning of my healing journey. Created during a difficult time with COPD and fibromyalgia, it symbolizes finding hope through art.
story: This was one of the first paintings I created after being diagnosed with COPD and fibromyalgia. The vibrant colors represent the hope I found through creating art, even when my body felt broken.

title: Strength in Vulnerability
description: A deeply personal piece that explores the strength found in accepting vulnerability and embracing the healing process.
story: Created during a particularly challenging period, this painting taught me that true strength comes from being vulnerable and open to healing.

title: Transformation
description: This large piece represents the transformation from illness to healing, from darkness to light, from despair to hope.
story: The largest piece in my healing collection, this painting represents my complete transformation through art therapy. Each brushstroke was a step toward wellness.

title: Gentle Healing
description: Soft, gentle colors that represent the tender care we must give ourselves during the healing process.
story: Sometimes healing isn't dramatic - it's gentle and gradual. This piece reminds me to be patient and kind with myself.

title: New Beginnings
description: A celebration of new beginnings and the fresh perspective that comes with healing and recovery.
story: After months of treatment and art therapy, I finally felt like myself again. This painting captures that moment of renewal and hope.

title: Inner Light
description: A radiant piece that represents the inner light we all possess, even in our darkest moments.
story: This painting reminds me that even when I felt completely lost, there was always a light within me that art helped me find.

title: Peaceful Recovery
description: A calming piece that represents the peace found through the healing process and art creation.
story: During my recovery, I found that creating art brought me a sense of peace I hadn't experienced in years.

title: Hope Rising
description: An uplifting piece that symbolizes hope rising from the ashes of illness and despair.
story: This painting marked a turning point in my healing journey. I finally felt hope again, and I knew art would be my path forward.

title: Healing Waters
description: Flowing water represents the continuous nature of healing - it's not a destination but a journey.
story: Water has always been healing for me. This painting represents how healing flows through us, washing away pain and bringing renewal.

title: Gratitude
description: A piece that expresses deep gratitude for the healing journey and the lessons learned along the way.
story: Even though my illness was difficult, I'm grateful for what it taught me about resilience, art, and the power of healing.
